Package org.sakaiproject.genericdao.util

Utilities which support JDBC and a few other misc things which assist with the generic dao

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CloseHookConnectionWrapper This is a connection wrapper that allows a close hook to be added to the connection
DateUtils Date conversion utilities, mostly for outputing dates in standard formats
JDBCUtils A set of utilities to help working with JDBC
JDBCUtils.QueryData Special class for passing SQL query data for running queries with, has methods to get the where statement and the set of params (args)
StringUtils Some simple utils to assist with string operations
ThreadboundConnectionsDataSourceWrapper This will bind the connections coming out of this dataSource to the current thread so there is only one connection per thread
TypeReference<T> A class which will sort of let us cheat and get to generics info at runtime if used correctly, derived from: http://gafter.blogspot.com/2006/12/super-type-tokens.html
 

Package org.sakaiproject.genericdao.util Description

Utilities which support JDBC and a few other misc things which assist with the generic dao
